name: Play Top Frag
description: Play Top Frag is a training software designed to measure, train and improve your skills on first-person shooter games. It measures qualities player skills that are required in a first-person shooter, for example hand-eye coordination, reaction time, memory, hearing, color sight and other things. All these tests are performed in a FPS-styled setting. Software measures and logs all the individual training sessions, so users can monitor their progress or compare their skills to other players in the same area or around the world.
